mapper.select: select p_no, p_name, to_char(p_price, '999G999G999') AS p_price , decode(p_maintype,'shoes','신발','clothes','의류', 'others','잡화') as p_maintype , decode(p_detailtype,'workingshoes','운동화','mtm','맨투맨/후드','slacks','슬랙스','jeans','청바지/면바지','coat','코트/점퍼' ,'walker','워커/정장화','cap','모자','socks','양말','acc','악세서리') as p_detailtype, stock, p_salecnt from prod
select p_no, p_name, p_info, p_price, p_maintype , p_detailtype, stock from prod where p_no = #{p_no}
SELECT nvl(max(p_no), 0) +1 AS p_no FROM prod
mapper.update: UPDATE prod SET p_name = #{p_name}, p_info = #{p_info}, p_price = #{p_price}, p_maintype = #{p_maintype} , p_detailtype = #{p_detailtype}, stock = #{stock} WHERE p_no = #{p_no}
UPDATE prod SET stock = stock + #{stock} WHERE p_no = #{p_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod (p_no, p_name, p_price, p_info, p_maintype, p_detailtype, p_mainimg, stock) VALUES (#{p_no}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_info}, #{p_maintype}, #{p_detailtype}, #{p_mainimg}, #{stock})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(m_no), 0) + 1 AS m_no FROM mall_mainimage
SELECT b_no, b_u_no, b_p_name, b_amount, b_paytype, TO_CHAR(b_regdate, 'YYYYMMDD') as b_regdate , TO_CHAR(b_paytotal, '999G999G999') as b_paytotal FROM prod_buy
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM prod_buy
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM prod_delivery ORDER BY d_no desc ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPage}) WHERE RNUM >= #{page}
mapper.update: UPDATE prod_delivery SET d_status = '발송완료' WHERE d_b_no = #{b_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM otoinquire WHERE i_status != '답변완료'
SELECT i_no, (SELECT u_name FROM mall_user WHERE u_no = i_u_no) AS i_u_name, TO_CHAR(i_regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS i_regdate , i_title, i_status FROM otoinquire ORDER BY i_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE otoinquire SET i_answer = #{i_answer}, i_status = '답변완료' WHERE i_no = #{i_no}
